_comment: SNAP Council – Decision Record Template v1.0
author: SNAP Scribe (ChatGPT)
_comment_overview: This template defines the canonical structure for documenting finalized Council decisions. Every Council decision must produce a Decision Record deriving from this template.

decision_metadata._comment_title: Short descriptive title for the decision.
decision_metadata._comment_associated_alignment_thread: Path to the alignment thread leading to this decision.
decision_metadata._comment_initiating_signal: If applicable, reference to original signal document.

decision_summary._comment: Concise statement of the final decision.
decision_summary._comment_resolution_statement: Precise description of the Council’s decision.
decision_summary._comment_rationale: Short explanation capturing the core logic behind the decision.

coherence_analysis._comment_overall_coherence_score: 0–4 scale weighted mean; optional but recommended.
strengths_noted: _example: Strong cross-scale alignment across human and model perspectives.
weaknesses_noted: _example: Narrative integrity concerns raised during objection window.
tradeoffs_considered: _example: Short-term risk reduction versus long-term adaptation cost.

objection_window_results._comment: Record any objections raised during the objection window and how they were handled.

objections._comment_resolution: How the objection was resolved or integrated.

governance_implications._comment: Detail how this decision affects Council operations, architecture, values, or external relations.
protocol_updates_required: _example: 'Update Membership Protocol v1.1 to include synthetic observer criteria.'
new_standards_adopted: _example: 'Minimum semantic stability threshold for external engagements.'

included_artifacts._comment: Canonical references to all artifacts used in forming this decision.

final_record._comment: Canonical output of this Decision Record for reference and public-council transparency.
final_record._comment_decision_statement_canonical: One-paragraph formal statement of the decision, suitable for quoting.
final_record._comment_posted_for_observers: If true, observer-facing summary must be added below.
final_record._comment_observer_summary: Optional simplified explanation if the decision is made visible to observers.

planned_additions: Direct linkage to AI-governance audit tools.
